name: Nautical Blast
description:
Controls:

Use space to shoot, the arrows keys to move AND up and down arrows to select powerups!

Every time the yellow bar fills up, the selected powerup will be cast, so make sure you have the right one selected. Don't forget to still use the up and down arrows to dodge!

To play online:
https://replit.com/@7axel7/Nautical-Blast-Bug-fix-1-score-now-works

You need to fork replit for fullscreen, and there is no sound on replit.
To play with sound, download the .zip file, and run main.exe
(exe with sound is bug fix 2)


Made by my brother and me in 3 days.

Brother made art, music, and some coding. @spoocejuice#3915

Original submission:

https://replit.com/@7axel7/version-3#main.py
